trans-unit.source: Specifies the edge or edges of an activity designer on a workflow design surface where design-time processing is performed, such as a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> location on the activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Określa krawędzi lub krawędzi Projektant działań na powierzchni projektu przepływu pracy, których przetwarzanie czasu projektowania jest wykonywane, takich jak <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref> lokalizacji na Projektant działań.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The enumeration value returned from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.ConnectionEdge%2A> that specifies where on the activity designer a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> or a collection of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> objects reside.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Wartość wyliczenia zwrócony z <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.ConnectionEdge%2A>który określa, gdzie na Projektant działań <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint>lub kolekcji <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint>znajdują się obiekty.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.ConnectionEdge%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.GetConnectionPoints%2A> method can be used to retrieve this collection.

You can also use it to determine which edge or edges of an activity designer a user is resizing by observing the DesignerEdges enumeration value returned from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerResizeEventArgs.SizingEdge%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Możesz również służy do określenia, które edge lub krawędzi działanie projektanta, który użytkownik jest zmiana rozmiaru obserwując wartość wyliczenia DesignerEdges zwrócony z <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerResizeEventArgs.SizingEdge%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerResizeEventArgs.SizingEdge%2A>

trans-unit.source: All edges of the activity designer.
The bottom edge of the activity designer.
The left edge of the activity designer.
None of the edges of the activity designer.
The right edge of the activity designer.
The top edge of the activity designer.
